sources.title: Uncle Joey (1941)
sources.description: Joey, a mouse caricature of Joe E. Brown, comes to visit a bunch of kiddie mice in their home inside a wall. A cat that's been chasing them is easily outwitted by Joey. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/uncle-joey-1941/

metadata.Plot: Joey, a mouse caricature of Joe E. Brown, comes to visit a bunch of kiddie mice in their home inside a wall. A cat that's been chasing them is easily outwitted by Joey.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Isadore Klein, Donald McKee
